sentence.Network_en: Oral fibrosis can cause betel nut chewing and mouth.
sentence.Network_cn: 吃槟榔会导致口腔纤维化,口腔癌.

sentence.Network_en: Many teenage girls thought selling betel nuts a gravy train.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多少女认为卖槟榔是一项薪水高、工作轻松的职业.

sentence.Network_en: People there chew it, somewhat like betel nut is chewed in Taiwan.
